name: Summer Eladrin
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Fearsome Presence: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.
traits.Fey Step (Recharge 4xe2x80x936): As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
traits.Magic Resistance: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage if used with two hands.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.
